caption.title: Estimation of heterogeneity and other epidemiological parameters for three HIV outbreaks in Sweden: IDU_AE (red), IDU_B(blue) and MSM_B (grey).
caption.p: On the top four panels, the distributions of the estimated parameters from a sample of 10000 posterior genealogies of each dataset are presented: the rate of diagnosis (A), the basic reproduction number (B), the Coefficient of Variation (C) and the Sackin Index normalized with the ‘PDA’ method (D). On the bottom, the time-scaled genealogies with the highest posterior probability are presented.
